articles.title: Drake Announces New Album Out At Midnight: Here's What We Know So Far
articles.content:
What Happened: Drake, the megastar from Toronto, announced his seventh studio album will be released Thursday night at midnight. He made the announcement on Instagram to his 113 million followers.
Drake said in the Instagram caption that the album will be titled “HONESTLY, NEVERMIND.” 
Unprecedented?: The post gathered more than 200,000 likes in less than 15 ...
